mapper.select: SELECT a.sdwWord ,c.sdwmPartOfSpeech ,c.sdwmContents ,d.sdweContents ,d.sdweTranslate ,b.sddDateChoice FROM sdWord a INNER JOIN sdDate b on b.sddSeq=a.sdDate_sddSeq INNER JOIN sdwMean c on c.sdWord_sdwSeq=a.sdwSeq INNER JOIN sdwExample d on d.sdWord_sdwSeq=a.sdwSeq WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY a.sdwWord
